description: The Moebius, apparently, is a smaller version of the Golem and, as such, shares much of its splendid technology. Generally what can be said about its larger sibling is also true with regard to the Moebius. Its manoeuvrability and thrust-to-payload ratio are each one of a kind, leading this class of ship, and its handsome weapon array outshines similar ships with ease. It is, however, not clear how PMC - a company better known for crude mining operations than the design of elegant and powerful warships - was able to acquire the Moebius design plans. One thing is clear to experts: PMC could not have it done it all by themselves.
name: Moebius
